p.k: When Bliss struggles to control her powers an evil force arises to take advantage. / When Him absorbs Bliss and her powers, the Girls must work together to rescue their sister and save Townsville from destruction. / When volunteering at a retirement home, Buttercup meets an old woman who claims she used to be a superhero. / When Bubblesâ€™ video goes viral, she goes to great lengths to maintain her status as a big-time director.
